Generator.TableNotConfigured: Table UUID not configured: {name}. Set it in the module settings.
Generator.TableNotFound: Table not found: {name}. Check the UUID in the module settings.
Generator.SubTableNotConfigured: Sub-table not configured for {type}. Set its UUID in the module settings.

Settings.TablePoiTypeHint: UUID of the main Point of Interest Type rollable table (determines the category).
Settings.TableTacticalThreatHint: UUID of the Tactical Threat sub-table. Results should contain POI actor UUIDs.
Settings.TableExplorationHint: UUID of the Exploration sub-table. Results should contain POI actor UUIDs.
Settings.TableRoutineHint: UUID of the Routine sub-table. Results should contain POI actor UUIDs.
Settings.TableUnknownHint: UUID of the Unknown sub-table. Results should contain POI actor UUIDs.
Settings.TableAssetTypeHint: UUID of the main Asset Type rollable table (determines the asset category).
Settings.TableAssetCharacterHint: UUID of the Character assets sub-table. Results should contain actor UUIDs.
Settings.TableAssetShipHint: UUID of the Ship assets sub-table. Results should contain actor UUIDs.
Settings.TableAssetResourceHint: UUID of the Resource assets sub-table. Results should contain actor UUIDs.
Settings.ProgressionPointsHint: The current number of Progression Points.
Settings.PrimaryPowerModeHint: How the primary power is chosen when converting actors to assets.

Converter.Title: Convert Actor to Asset

Converter.UnsupportedType: Actor type '{type}' cannot be converted to an asset.
Converter.NoTraitsOrFocuses: No traits or focuses found on this actor.
